attributes.action: Introduce recycling incentives for people that do there bit for the environment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Introducing recycling incentives would increase the rate of recycling in the UK. If we were given money off coupons or vouchers for the old packaging at the supermarket or recycling centres. Councils across britain are making money by recycling but we do not receive anything back for helping them.
